channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41254|2024-08-03T12:35:49.658Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cons3rt%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-41252|2024-08-03T12:35:49.566Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cons3rt%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read permission to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-41255|2024-08-03T12:42:44.074Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cons3rt%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier stores Cons3rt API token unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2022-41253|2024-08-03T12:35:49.734Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20cons3rt%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins CONS3RT Plugin 1.0.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
